About The Summit:

Meet leading utility scale and commercial rooftop project developers, investors, lenders, and other key industry players who are looking to do deals and discover:

What opportunities exist in the utility scale and commercial rooftop markets
What opportunities exist for partners and investors to get involved in upcoming deals
How to successfully exploit profitable monetization strategies and deal structures
What it will take to get deals successfully done in 2007 and beyond       


About The Workshop:

Hear solar project finance professionals discuss their insights and the techniques you need to make your projects winners in the market place. The Pre-Summit Workshop, Successfully Bidding & Financing Projects in the Commercial Market, will:

Provide practical guidance on how to navigate the project financing for various entities such as local governments, big box retailers and school systems
Explore case studies illustrating the power purchase agreement model (PPA) and purchase/lease model
